import React, { useContext, useEffect } from "react"; import Context from "../config/context"; import { Form, Modal, Button, Header, Dropdown, Image, Grid } from "semantic-ui-react"; export default function Detail(props) { const context = useContext(Context); const { currency, convertCurrency } = context; useEffect(() => { convertCurrency(props.product); }, []) console.log(currency); return ( Show product}>
); }
